info.title: Microstrate Gateway
info.description:
API for managing Microstrate Gateways, Mappings, and Mapping Versions.

A Gateway serves as an entry point for requests, a Mapping defines routes within a gateway,
and a Mapping Version defines specific implementations of a mapping.

post.description: Creates a new gateway with default configurations

get.description: Retrieves details about a specific gateway
Retrieves a list of all available gateways
